summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium 1'' Ultra-Thin Straightening Iron features smooth titanium plates and 5'' extended plates.
details: DetailsBenefitsHigh heat levels provide excellent straightening resultsNano Titanium technology protects hair from damageExtended plates for faster straighteningSlim design helps when creating flat iron curlsFeatures1'' Ultra-smooth titanium plates conduct ultra-high heat and resist corrosionCeramic heater, instant heat-up and recovery5'' full-floating extended plates50 heat settings - up to 450 FHousing resists ultra-high heat9 ft swivel cordLimited 4-year manufacturer warrantyDual VoltageItem 2216684

reviews.headline: Still working after 4 years
reviews.comments: I've had this straightener for almost four years. I've dropped this thing multiple times and it still works great. It will crimp your hair if the straightener is kept in one spot a little too long, so you have to work fast. It's not great for curling because of the crimping, but it will do the job. I do like that the cord is long because it allows me to move around with it.

reviews.headline: Great flat iron - cord way way too long
reviews.comments: Im a long time, loyal Babyliss product user. I have 3 Babyliss blow dryers in my home. This is my 2nd flat iron purchase. But WHY WHY WHY is the cord so long? It gets twisted, kinked, and stuck and I've nearly burned myself multiple times as a result! It's the worst!  Who needs a 9 ft long cord?!?!

reviews.headline: Has broken 3 times
reviews.comments: I have purchased this straightner three times. I loved loved loved it and used it everyday but each time it has suddenly broke (stays on for 30 seconds and then shuts off). Not worth your money AT ALL. Way to expensive to last a month.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: I've recently begun straightening my own hair to prepare for college and this flat iron has been amazing! I would totally recommend this for beginners. I got the one inch version and it helps me get the roots of my 3b hair. I also noticed that this specific flat iron makes my hair super shiny as well.

reviews.headline: MY FAVORITE!!
reviews.comments: My hair is wavy but still very dry and will tend to frizz if I use any other straightener! When I say this is my go to and I will buy FOREVER! It is a little pricey but worth every penny! My hair always looks and feels silky smooth after using! 10/10

reviews.headline: I wanted to like this.....
reviews.comments: I was recommended by my stylist to purchase this brand. It is a GREAT straightening iron, though I am not used to the titanium plates, it did snag my hair when I tried to use it to curl my hair. It didn't really work for curling which is what i use it for mostly. I will say great iron if your looking to straighten your hair, maybe not so much curl it.

reviews.headline: Stopped working after 3 months
reviews.comments:
I bought this in November and stopped working early February 
Of course it just past the return date.  So annoying that these expensive products are made like garbage

reviews.headline: Didn't last
reviews.comments: It was a good hair straightener but stopped working after 2.5 years. Will not rebuy.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have very think hair and this flat iron does a great job for me

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: This straightener stopped working 7 months after I bought it. And Ulta also didn't want to do anything about replacing it for me.

reviews.headline: get yourself one right now!!
reviews.comments: i can not begin to explain how great this straightener is! when done properly, it makes your hair LAST and compared to other straighteners (coming from a curly girl with a ton of hair) it gets your hair super sleek for ages while beating humidity and rain yet still not affecting my hair its so good and effective go buyyy *2 inch

reviews.headline: Dissatisfied
reviews.comments: After 2 years my flat iron stopped working. Not worth the price for it to suddenly just stop working. Going back to my argan oil $50 flat iron that still holds up to this day lol. Smh.

reviews.headline: Lasted a little over a year
Excellent
reviews.comments: I have coarse thick curly hair. Like a loose perm. I had my old flat iron for over 6 yrs. (1 1/4"). I bought the 2" Babyliss & used it super quick on my hair & then made another touch up just the front curtain bangs. Took all of about 7 min. Very pleased & the dryer was an added bonus.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Wasn't impressed with how it straighten. And the handle is hard to grip

reviews.headline: Would buy over & over!
reviews.comments: I've spent thousands of dollars on hair products I even own a Dyson hairdryer and an air wrap. I never get as many compliments as I do when I use this on my hair! I have had this flat iron for years and I always get compliments on how my hair looks when I use it. I am now only leaving this review because I have come back to purchase one for my sister for Christmas. I am only wishing I had the 2in one case I have long think curly hair.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: It pulls my hair when I use it and i have to have it on the highest heat for it to actually straighten my hair. I also have to go through the same sections about 5 times for it to straighten all the way. Very disappointed in the product.

reviews.headline: Fabulous Flat Iron
reviews.comments: This is truly a professional level flat iron.  It gets the frizz out of my wavy hair and makes it completely straight.  My only issue is that the plastic outside the heated plates can get very hot.  I normally use my thumb and forefinger to help clasp the iron down, but you can't do that with this.  Too hot!

faceoff_positive.comments: My daughter and I both have wavy, frizzy hair. This is by far the best flat iron we have ever used. Leaves the hair silky smooth, and shiny.
faceoff_positive.headline: Awesome flat iron!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: It heats up fast, but I've beenjsing it daily for about three months and the metal on the plates it already chipping and scratched off, and the blue on the iron has flakes and coming off as well. It will pull my hair out sometimes or gets stuck and doesn't glide smoothly anymore. Not impressed considering the cost.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just ok.
